Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at 119th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via 119th, Wentowrth, 115th, Halsted and 119th: due to, street blockage near 119th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via 119th, Wentowrth, 115th, Halsted and 119th: due to, street blockage near 119th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Fullerton
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to unauthorized person on the tracks. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
